trans-unit.source: Used to track relationships between objects in the object context.
trans-unit.target: 개체 컨텍스트에서 개체 간의 관계를 추적하는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> is used to track relationships between objects in an object context.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager>는 개체 컨텍스트에서 개체 간의 관계를 추적하는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: There is one instance of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> class for each relationship tracked in the object context.
trans-unit.target: 개체 컨텍스트에서 추적되는 각 관계에 대해 하나의 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> 클래스 인스턴스가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Relationships are defined by associations in a conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 관계는 개념적 모델에서 연결에 의해 정의 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
The example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: 이 예에서는 새로운 추가 `SalesOrderHeader` 엔터티는 `Contact` 엔터티.

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays the relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 관련된 end를 모두 가져오고는 `Contact` 엔터티 및 각 관련 end 관계 이름, 소스 역할 이름 및 대상 역할 이름을 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Reference to the entity that is calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출하고 있는 엔터티에 대한 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> object.
The requested <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" />.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> method is used by objects that implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.

When Object Services requests the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> property of an object that implements <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>, the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> method is called if the relationship manager does not already exist for the object.
trans-unit.target: 개체 서비스에서 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager>를 구현하는 개체의 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> 속성을 요청하면 개체에 관계 관리자가 이미 있지 않은 경우 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> 메서드가 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all the related ends managed by the relationship manager.
trans-unit.target: 관계 관리자에서 관리하는 모든 관련 End의 열거형을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of objects that implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.
An empty enumeration is returned when the relationships have not yet been populated.
trans-unit.target: 관계가 아직 채워지지 않았으면 빈 열거형이 반환됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.GetAllRelatedEnds%2A> method returns an enumeration of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.GetAllRelatedEnds%2A> 의 열거형을 반환 하는 메서드 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 및 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> are concrete types that derive from <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 및 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> 에서 파생 되는 구체적인 형식이 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> abstract class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> interface.
The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832).
The example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: 이 예에서는 새로운 추가 `SalesOrderHeader` 엔터티는 `Contact` 엔터티.

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end,
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 관련된 end를 모두 가져오고는 `Contact` 엔터티 및 관계 이름을 표시 합니다., 소스 역할 이름 및 각 관련된 end에 대 한 대상 역할 이름을

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />.
Name of the relationship to navigate.
The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
Name of the target role for the navigation.
Indicates the direction of navigation across the relationship.
Gets an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> of related objects with the specified relationship name and target role name.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 관계 이름 및 대상 역할 이름을 사용하여 관련 개체의 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> of related objects.
Gets an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> of related objects that have the specified relationship name and target role name.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 관계 이름 및 대상 역할 이름을 가진 관련 개체의 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The relationship name should not be namespace qualified.
An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.
trans-unit.target: @FSHO2@관계 이름 앞에 네임스페이스를 추가하면 오류가 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified role returned an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> instead of an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />.
Name of the relationship in which <c>targetRoleName</c> is defined.
The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
Target role to use to retrieve the other end of <c>relationshipName</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>relationshipName</c>의 반대편 End를 검색하는 데 사용되는 대상 역할입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns either an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> of the correct type for the specified target role in a relationship.
trans-unit.target: 관계에서 지정된 대상 역할에 대한 올바른 형식의 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> 또는 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> that was retrieved.
This method is intended to be used in scenarios where the user does not have full metadata, including the static type information for both ends of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 사용자에게 관계의 양쪽 End에 대한 정적 형식 정보를 포함한 전체 메타데이터가 없는 시나리오에서 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This metadata is specified in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute> object on each entity type in the relationship, so the metadata system can retrieve it based on the supplied relationship name and target role name.
trans-unit.target: 이 메타데이터는 관계의 각 엔터티 형식에 대한 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute> 개체에 지정되므로 메타데이터 시스템에서 제공된 관계 이름 및 대상 역할 이름을 기반으로 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The relationship name should not be namespace qualified.
An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.
trans-unit.target: @FSHO2@관계 이름 앞에 네임스페이스를 추가하면 오류가 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relationshipName" /> or <paramref name="targetRoleName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The source type does not match the type of the owner.
trans-unit.target: 소스 형식이 소유자의 형식과 일치하지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetRoleName" /> is invalid.
-or-
Unable to find the relationship type in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 메타데이터에서 관계 형식을 찾을 수 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" />.
Name of the relationship to navigate.
The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
Name of the target role for the navigation.
Indicates the direction of navigation across the relationship.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> for a related object by using the specified combination of relationship name and target role name.
trans-unit.target: 관계 이름 및 대상 역할 이름의 지정된 조합을 사용하여 관련 개체의 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" />를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> of a related object.
The relationship name should not be namespace qualified.
An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.
trans-unit.target: @FSHO2@관계 이름 앞에 네임스페이스를 추가하면 오류가 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified role returned an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> instead of an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" />.
The type of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> being initialized.
The relationship name.
The role name of the related end.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> to initialize.
Initializes an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> that was created by using the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자를 사용하여 만든 기존 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />을 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedCollection%2A> method initializes an existing <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> that was created by using the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedCollection%2A> 메서드는 기본 생성자를 사용하여 만든 기존 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>을 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> is initialized by using the provided relationship and target role names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>은 제공된 관계 및 대상 역할 이름을 사용하여 초기화됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedCollection%2A> method is used during deserialization only.
When the provided <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> is already initialized.
-or-
When the relationship manager is already attached to an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />.
-or-
When the relationship manager already contains a relationship with this name and target role.
trans-unit.target: 관계 관리자에 이 이름 및 대상 역할의 관계가 이미 포함되어 있는 경우

trans-unit.source: The type of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> being initialized.
The relationship name.
The role name of the related end.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> to initialize.
Initializes an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> that was created by using the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자를 사용하여 만든 기존 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" />을 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedReference%2A> method initializes an existing <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> that was created by using the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedReference%2A> 메서드는 기본 생성자를 사용하여 만든 기존 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>을 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> is initialized by using the provided relationship and target role names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>은 제공된 관계 및 대상 역할 이름을 사용하여 초기화됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.InitializeRelatedReference%2A> method is used during deserialization only.
When the provided <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference`1" /> is already initialized.
-or-
When the relationship manager is already attached to an <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" />.
-or-
When the relationship manager already contains a relationship with this name and target role.
trans-unit.target: 관계 관리자에 이 이름 및 대상 역할의 관계가 이미 포함되어 있는 경우

trans-unit.source: The serialized stream.
Used internally to deserialize entity objects along with the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager" /> 인스턴스와 함께 엔터티 개체를 deserialize하기 위해 내부적으로 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Describes the source and destination of a given serialized stream, and provides an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: 주어진 serialize된 스트림의 소스 및 대상을 설명하고 추가 호출자 정의 컨텍스트를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by Object Services to prepare an <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityKey" /> for binary serialization with a serialized relationship.
trans-unit.target: serialize된 관계를 사용하여 이진 serialization에 대한 <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityKey" />를 준비하기 위해 개체 서비스에서 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Serialization of relationships is only supported for binary serialization.
Complete object graphs, including relationships, is not supported for Windows Communication Foundation and XML serialization.
trans-unit.target: 관계를 포함한 전체 개체 그래프는 Windows Communication Foundation 및 XML serialization에서 지원되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Serializing Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/06c77f9b-5b2e-4c78-b3e3-8c148ba0ea99).
